AI Description: Xerces-C++ is a validating XML parser written in C++ and released by the Apache Software Foundation. It is a high-performance, feature-rich parser that is widely used for parsing and processing XML documents in a variety of applications.
Core Features: Validating Xml Parser, Supports Xml Schema, Sax & Dom Parsers, Unicode Support, High Performance, Portable Across Various Platforms
General Tags: Xml Parser, Data Processing, Software Development
